newsitem.title: USA: Dow industrials mixed in early trade, techs soft.
newsitem.headline: Dow industrials mixed in early trade, techs soft.

text.p: U.S. blue chip stocks shifted between a positive and negative range after opening lower in mixed trade on Thursday. Technology stocks weakened after several companies preannounced earnings warnings.
"Both traders and investors are treading water here and the market is trying to find its footing after volatile sessions this past week," Alan Ackerman, market strategist at Fahnestock & Co, said.
The Dow Jones industrial average was off around 13 points at 7677 and Nasdaq was down about three points at 1443.
The long bond was off 7/32 at a 6.76 percent yield.
